name: Calculated hours IS Functional Design Specification
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(IS Functional Design Specification:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Functional_Design_Specification_Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval((16 + (( <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*>- 1) * 4))) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(IS_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval([IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Functional_Design_Specification_Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval(16 + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> - 1) * 4)) *>}{0}[ENDIF] *0.8) *>}{<* Eval(([IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Functional_Design_Specification_Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval(16 + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> - 1) * 4)) *>}{0}[ENDIF] *0.8)*1.1) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
